title: The Collected Absolution (Avatar|2009->|Digital-HR|Empire)
description:
Overview:  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absolution_%28comics%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absolution_%28comics%29</a>
            
            
Premise:   "How about a superhero serial killer?"
            
            John Dusk is a veteran superhero in a world where super-humans are a 
            sanctioned arm of law enforcement, facing the same rules, restrictions 
            and frustrations as any cop. After being pushed too far, he crosses the 
            line no cop is supposed to... and it feels good. He wants to keep doing 
            it, even though he knows it puts him on a collision course with his 
            teammates, friends and his girlfriend, a homicide detective.
            
               He's not crazy.
               He knows it's wrong.
               He wants to be forgiven...
            
                  ... but he does not want to stop.
            
            
Contains:   Absolution (2009) (Digital-HR) (Darkness-Empire)
              (single volume compiled from the single-issue re-releases, 
               same as <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9183521" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9183521</a>  )
            
            Absolution - Rubicon (2013) (Digital-HR) (Empire)
              (single volume compiled from the brand-new single-issue re-releases)
            
            Absolution - Happy Kitty (2013) (Digital-HR) (Darkness-Empire)
              (special issue, original 0-Day release)
